content: when i make my weebee snowman using worsted/4/aran/10ply weight yarn and a 3mm hook he stands at 8 5 inches tall made from the toes to the top of the head in one go arms can either be sewn or crocheted on other yarn weights and hooks can of course be used to create a smaller or larger snowmen weebee snowman has the same legs and body shape as well as arm width as the standard size weebee doll 4 so he/she can wear all of the tops trousers dresses sweaters shoes boots etc from all of the other weebee doll outfit patterns - you can find them all here in my ravelry store 5 this pattern consists of snowman hat scarf mittens boots link to free skirt pattern is included too this pattern has been fully tested by three members of the weebee appreciation society facebook group 6 and every effort has been made to ensure that this pattern is error free and ready for sale weebee is named after my youngest niece phoebe - when she was first born my daughter and phoebe s older sister couldn t say her name properly yet and she has been nicknamed weebee ever since finished products created with this pattern may be used for commercial sale yarn and hook size my weebee patterns are designed so that you can use any yarn or hook of your choice to achieve different sized dolls to your liking therefore the clothing patterns have no specific yarn or hook size specifications but information is contained within which will help you to create the perfect fit for your specific doll terminology us other items needed stitch marker stuffing tapestry needle pair of 10 or 12mm safety eyes level of difficulty advanced beginner format of pattern pdf -
